title: As a Service manager, I need to obtain the most accurate information presented in my KPIs, so that I can accurately determine how  good (customer satisfaction) and how expensive (cost per transaction) my service is. (101364)

details.benefit: I can accurately determine how  good (customer satisfaction) and how expensive (cost per transaction) my service is.
details.goal: obtain the most accurate information presented in my KPIs
details.impact: Has consequences for the majority of your users
justifications: There is clear demand for it from users
It's something the government provides/does/pays for
met_when: Can look at data and be confident that it is an accurate portrayal of how well a service is performing and how expensive it is to run.

available_translations.title: As a Service manager, I need to obtain the most accurate information presented in my KPIs, so that I can accurately determine how  good (customer satisfaction) and how expensive (cost per transaction) my service is. (101364)
